DOC.brief_summary: Comparing patients receiving subanesthetic doses of Ketamine vs placebo to see if it can reduce narcotic needs for patients receiving a tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy
DOC.brief_title: Low Dose Ketamine as an Adjunct to Fentanyl in Outpatient Tonsillectomy
DOC.criteria: between 3 and 12 years of age ASA 1 or 2 did not consent
